issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
H5.Description

When creating a module for a non-iOS platform, I'm still prompted for the code base type, this prompt should only show if the platforms includes ios

h5.Steps to reproduce

1. Run {{ti create --log-level trace --name foobarmodule --force --type module --platforms android --id com.foo}}

h5.Actual

Prompted for the code base type

h5.Expected

No prompt for code base type
fields.summary: CLI: Prompted for ios code base type when creating an android module

comments.body:
*Closing ticket.* Fix verified in SDK version {{8.0.0.v20181127032313}} by testing the steps in the description. 

Test and other information can be found at
https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/10489
